name: Recovery Ridge
description: Recovery Ridge, LLC is a NARR certified Recovery Housing Organization dedicated to providing a supportive and structured environment for individuals recovering from alcohol and drug addiction. They offer intensive outpatient therapy and recovery housing accommodations with 12 Step structure and boundaries to help individuals avoid relapse during early stages of recovery.
source: Verified from official Recovery Ridge website and Facebook page
address1: Multiple locations in London, KY area
eligibility_requirements: Individuals recovering from alcohol and drug addiction seeking structured sober living environment
populations_served: Individuals in recovery from substance use disorders
